examples: He was sent off for arguing with the referee.
Fue expulsado por discutir con el árbitro.
The principal often acts as a referee for his students.
El director a menudo actúa como árbitro para sus estudiantes.
His former employer agreed to act as a referee for him.
Su antiguo empleador acordó actuar como árbitro para él.
to act as a referee between the parties involved
actuar como árbitro entre las partes involucradas
